story: You are looking for a laptop. You edit game clips and also play on the same machine. You want a big screen, smooth performance while recording, and fast load times. You keep both games and projects locally, and sometimes hand clients a disc. You often plug into a TV or projector. Battery life isn’t a priority; steady performance is.
